title: Cognitive Modeling and Intermediate Problem-Solving-Based Advanced Mathematics Learning Process

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners build cognitive models using the DoCoPro system and enhance metacognitive abilities by solving peer-generated problems. Learning activities proceed flexibly in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can structure mathematical problem-solving processes using cognitive modeling techniques
Learners can diagnose and revise incompleteness in their cognitive models by solving peer-generated intermediate problems
Learners can explain the process of improving cognitive models using metacognitive strategies (self-monitoring, reflection)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
